txt.en: There are captains among the White Hand army inside Madh-fushaum.\n\nYou should defeat the White Hand captains, for their defeat would surely cause turmoil among the ranks present.
You have succeeded in defeating the captains within Madh-fushaum, and already you can hear sounds of confusion coming from the distance.

An army of this size needs strong leadership to help coordinate between the different groups. There appears to be captains of the Dunlendings, Uruk-hai, and Orcs that are barking orders at their soldiers. Defeating them would surely cause turmoil among the ranks present.
The White Hand army within Madh-fushaum is comprised of mostly Orcs, Uruk-hai, and Dunlendings. Each force is led by a captain of their own kind.
There are captains among the White Hand army inside Madh-fushaum.\n\nYou should defeat the White Hand captains, for their defeat would surely cause turmoil among the ranks present.

The White Hand army is now without a few of its captains, and this is certain to cause turmoil in their ranks. Already, you can hear the sounds of confusion and chaos spreading throughout Madh-fushaum.
